product_name: MaryJanesFarm Organic Red Pesto Pasta - Single Serving
long_description: This scrumptious spaghetti-based pasta has parmesan cheese, basil and oregano to set off your Italian taste buds! Warm, melted strings of parmesan cheese throughout make a meal you'll want again. Made with all-natural, organic ingredients. Can be prepared in its own pouch; just add boiling water, stir and let stand before serving. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
